author: pipermerriam
content: It seems finalizing `eth/69` (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9237) still needs input as well.  I believe we still need sign-off from Erigon, NimbusEL, and EthereumJS.

author: pipermerriam
content: Meta EIP for history expiry PR open.  Currently marked as draft, but I'm ready for suggestions if anyone has any they'd like to give: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/9572

author: smartprogrammer
content:
yeah, there is also still a discussion going on here around the spec:

author: pipermerriam
content: What can I do to help move that towards a decision?  Should we schedule a call or breakout for EL teams to discuss?  Is async discussion in that thread or github issue sufficient?  What (if anything) is currently blocked by that not being finalized?

author: smartprogrammer
content: A breakout call would be nice as currently we only have opinions from Nethermind and Geth around the spec and we havent heard from other execution clients on it.
